reviews.text:
Never rated a clinic before....here goes:
Medicine tasted not too bad.  Some were a bit too sweet. The pills were nicely shaped and easy to swallow.  Ambient was coolingly cold.  I loved that they have a weighing machine that can take height measurement and they have a machine you can self serve to take blood pressure.

Haha.
Anyways....
I loved this place as it is not yet so crowded.  There are a lurkin, coffee bean and Baker and Cook cafe.  Same doctor for now and this is good.  Staff is great and service is prompt.

Wonderful experience with clinic nurse MeiQi! She is very friendly, patience, and knowledgeable.
She made the whole process smooth and stress free. You can tell she truly cares about patient. Highly recommend!

Dr. Chia is a caring and attentive physician who truly takes the time to understand and address patientâ€™s concerns. I always feel well taken care of during my visits. Nurse Meiqi is equally wonderful, very friendly and always so helpful. The whole clinic provides a comforting and professional atmosphere.

I had the pleasure of visiting Pinnacle at Dairy Farm recently, and I can't say enough good things about the experience, particularly the nurse MeiQi was incredibly welcoming and professional from the moment I walked in. She took the time to explain everything thoroughly, answered all my questions and made sure I felt comfortable throughout my entire visit.
Her friendly and caring attitude really shout out and you can tell she genuinely cares about the patients. It's rare to find such an attentive staff for GP clinic! I highly recommend this clinic to everyone look for Family GP clinic!

I had to deal with a bad sore throat and cough in April and Dr Chia and MeiQi were very helpful and caring in assisting me to cope with the discomfort of my illness.   Also with an ankle pain that I suffered from.   I am most comfortable to consult with this clinic whenever I have a health problem.
